thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Allied Properties Qtrly FFO Per Unit $0.54

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allied Properties Qtrly FFO Per Unit $0.54

organizations.name: allied properties real estate investment trust

text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Allied Properties Real Estate Investment Trust:
* ALLIED ANNOUNCES FIRST-QUARTER RESULTS
* QTRLY AFFO PER UNIT $0.44 * MANAGEMENT EXPECTS OPERATING, ACQUISITION & DEVELOPMENT ENVIRONMENTS “TO REMAIN SUPPORTIVE THIS YEAR”
* Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW C$0.53 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * INTERNAL FORECAST CONTEMPLATES SOLID MID-SINGLE-DIGIT PERCENTAGE GROWTH IN SAME-ASSET NOI IN FY
* SEES LOW-SINGLE-DIGIT PERCENTAGE GROWTH IN FFO PER UNIT IN FY
* SEES HIGH-SINGLE-DIGIT PERCENTAGE GROWTH IN AFFO PER UNIT IN FY
* MANAGEMENT EXPECTS CONTINUED GROWTH IN ALLIED’S NAV PER UNIT OVER REMAINDER OF YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
